attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should ex sevicemen and women pay tax on thier pensions after serving for thier queen and country,when you read in the press and media,that immigration,are living in mansions with 7 children,dont work,put nothing into our country,and not even born here,so why should we pay taxes,to give these people a good living off our earnings,that we deserve,for putting our lives on the line for queen and country

rejection.details: You may wish to sign the petition at http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/SevicePensions/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
